price: 44. Unless it be a mercy from Us, and as an enjoyment for a while.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
